mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Term.insertTerm */ META.TB008( 도메인일련번호, 용어일련번호, 용어명, 용어카멜명, 용어스네이크명, 시스템생성자, 시스템수정자, 시스템생성일, 시스템수정일 ) VALUES ( #{domainSno} :: BIGINT, #{termSno} :: BIGINT, #{termName}, #{termCamelName}, #{termSnakeName}, #{sysCreator}, #{sysCreator}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT /* Term.selectTerm */ 도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, 용어일련번호 AS TERM_SNO, 용어명 AS TERM_NAME, 용어카멜명 AS TERM_CAMEL_NAME, 용어스네이크명 AS TERM_SNAKE_NAME, 시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, 시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT FROM META.TB008 WHERE 1 = 1 AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: BIGINT AND 용어일련번호 = #{termSno} :: BIGINT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /* Term.selectTermList */ TB008.도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, TB008.용어일련번호 AS TERM_SNO, TB008.용어명 AS TERM_NAME, TB008.용어카멜명 AS TERM_CAMEL_NAME, TB008.용어스네이크명 AS TERM_SNAKE_NAME, TB007.도메인명 AS DOMAIN_NAME, TB007.도메인타입 AS DOMAIN_TYPE, TB008.시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, TB008.시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(TB008.시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(TB008.시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT, COUNT(1) OVER() AS COUNT FROM META.TB008 TB008, META.TB007 TB007 WHERE 1 = 1 AND TB008.도메인일련번호 = TB007.도메인일련번호
AND TB008.도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: BIGINT
AND TB008.용어일련번호 = #{termSno} :: BIGINT
AND TB008.용어명 LIKE '%'||#{termName}||'%'
AND TB008.용어카멜명 LIKE '%'||#{termCamelName}||'%'
AND TB008.용어스네이크명 LIKE '%'||#{termSnakeName}||'%'
ORDER BY TB008.용어일련번호 DESC ) A OFFSET (#{pageNum} :: BIGINT - 1) * #{rowAmountPerPage} :: BIGINT LIMIT #{rowAmountPerPage} :: BIGINT

SELECT /* Term.selectTermScList */ TB008.도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, TB008.용어일련번호 AS TERM_SNO, TB008.용어명 AS TERM_NAME, TB008.용어카멜명 AS TERM_CAMEL_NAME, TB008.용어스네이크명 AS TERM_SNAKE_NAME, TB007.도메인타입 AS DOMAIN_TYPE, TB008.시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, TB008.시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(TB008.시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(TB008.시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT, COUNT(1) OVER() AS COUNT FROM META.TB008 TB008 , META.TB007 TB007 WHERE 1 = 1 AND TB008.도메인일련번호 = TB007.도메인일련번호
AND TB008.용어명 LIKE '%'||#{termName}||'%'
AND TB008.용어명 NOT IN ('시스템생성자', '시스템수정자', '시스템생성일', '시스템수정일') ORDER BY TB008.용어명 DESC
mapper.update:
DELETE /* Term.deleteTermInfo */ FROM META.TB008 WHERE 1 = 1 AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: BIGINT
AND 용어일련번호 = #{termSno} :: BIGINT
mapper.select: SELECT /* Term.selectTermRegCheck */ ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) >= 1 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM META.TB008 WHERE 용어명 = #{termName} ) AS TERM_NAME_ABLE_YN , ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) >= 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM META.TB007 WHERE 도메인명 = #{domainName} ) AS DOMAIN_NAME_ABLE_YN

SELECT /* Term.selectTermByName */ TB008.도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, TB008.용어일련번호 AS TERM_SNO, TB008.용어명 AS TERM_NAME, TB008.용어카멜명 AS TERM_CAMEL_NAME, TB008.용어스네이크명 AS TERM_SNAKE_NAME, TB007.도메인명 AS DOMAIN_NAME, TB007.도메인타입 AS DOMAIN_TYPE, TB008.시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, TB008.시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(TB008.시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(TB008.시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT FROM META.TB007 TB007 , META.TB008 TB008 WHERE 1 = 1 AND TB008.도메인일련번호 = TB007.도메인일련번호 AND 용어명 = #{termName}
